title: some b.s with 3star champs and items and some suggestions.
body:
so im playing and i have a 2* warwick with cursed blade, titanic hydra and red buff.
i find my last warwick for 3* on the carousel whos holding a large rod.
i get back to my field and i now have a 3* warwick with a large rod, a cursed blade and red buff.
my ww now has 3 items so i have no way of putting hydra back on him...
not sure how you would sort this out without being able to take items off champs.


my suggestions for changes to tft are
an undo button, for items (accidents happen) that you can only use during planning in the same phase you made the item of course.
maybe an undo button for selling champs (only usable in the same phase you sold the champ and if you havent rerolled sinse) again accidents happen.

replies.body:
Ughhhh I REALLY hate this.
I had the same thing happen upgrading a unit from 2 to 3.
They would've had 4 items after combining so the game dropped one of them to the bench.

There is no indication which will be dropped.
I can't tell if it was the last item created or first or what.

Undo sounds like it would be difficult to implement.
**I would recommend simply causing ALL ITEMS to fall of the character if combining would cause them to exceed the cap.**

> Undo sounds like it would be difficult to implement.
> **I would recommend simply causing ALL ITEMS to fall of the character if combining would cause them to exceed the cap.**

That would take away a bit of the permanence of items, which I don't believe they're going to change.  I would instead suggest that if combining would add a 4th item, the FOURTH items simply doesn't get put on, and you retain what was already there.  You had to purposefully put max items on someone, so there's no reason you should be able to add something in addition.  It should be the "new" item that gets thrown on the bench, rather than ones you designed to be there permanently.
Just add a question after the carousel asking if you want to combine.  EZ fix
